name: Space Shooter (itch) (Chelsea)
description:
Only Level 1 is close to being finished, so check back later for more updates! I still couldn't get the video to play in the background, so a photo will have to do for now.

On hiatus.

Things I'd like to add later on:

- Number of lives -> icons

- Finish 3 levels with increasing difficulty

- Write better instructions

- Add some powerups: speed? more lasers? smaller ship?

- Add some obstacles: bigger aliens? more free-floating asteroids?
